attributes.action: Look at the bus service changed
attributes.additional_details: The bus service from Northampton to Towcester has been cut Dramatically it is not in the best interests of the people, I would think people are going to loose their jobs over this, the elderly are going to suffer and it’s not acceptable, you give the disabled bus passes then the busses are cut, people visiting sick friend and family at the hospital will no longer be able to
attributes.background: We want the bus service that we have had for so long to be reinstated

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local bus services are a matter for bus operators and the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
